info.name: CV AI Analyzer API - Updated
info.description: Complete API collection for the CV AI Analyzer microservice with proper endpoints and realistic test data

request.description: Submit structured CV data for AI analysis
Submit CV analysis with force restart to override existing pending analysis
Get current status and progress of CV analysis
Get AI feedback results for completed analysis
Get specific version of analysis feedback
Mark an improvement suggestion as applied
Force restart a stuck or failed analysis
Preview stuck jobs cleanup without making changes
Execute cleanup of all stuck jobs in the system
Get all analysis history for a specific CV
Get all analyses for a specific user with filtering and pagination
Ask a question related to CV analysis results
Get conversation history for current session
Get all Q&A interactions for user
Test with senior data scientist CV
